roleset.name: help grow, develop
roleset.note: NURTURE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'nurture' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from nurture.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: He-3 also vowed [*-3]-1 to `` make every effort [*]-1 to nurture ... a constructive new relationship that [*T*-2] has been forged [*-1] with participating employee groups . ''
example.arg: a constructive new relationship that [*T*-2] has been forged [*-1]with participating employee groups

example.name: arg1
example.text: Can the voluminous broadcast of such TV dramas on TV channels [seahome] : bring pleasant visual enjoyment and spiritual nurture to viewers ?
